    softmmu/memory: Pass ram_flags to memory_region_init_ram_shared_nomigrate()
    
    Let's forward ram_flags instead, renaming
    memory_region_init_ram_shared_nomigrate() into
    memory_region_init_ram_flags_nomigrate().
